import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useRef } from 'react' import PageTitle from '../../components/layout/PageTitle' import SectionTitle from '../../components/layout/SectionTitle' const UseRef = (props) => { const [value1, setValue1] = useState("") const count = useRef(0) count.current++ return (
Valor: {value1} [ {count.current} ]
setValue1(e.target.value)} />
) } export default UseRef
